[ti:Last Christmas (Single Version)]
[ar:Wham!]
[al:Now That's What I Call Christmas]

[00:00.00]Last Christmas (Single Version) - Wham! (威猛乐队)
[00:09.35]Written by：George Michael
[00:18.71]Last Christmas I gave you my heart
[00:21.64]
[00:22.48]But the very next day you gave it away
[00:25.84]
[00:27.39]This year to save me from tears
[00:30.58]
